sections.heading: Compensation for beekeeping equipment and honeybees contained therein destroyed due to infection with American foulbrood.
sections.text: for beekeeping equipment and honeybees contained therein destroyed due to infection with American foulbrood.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter:(1)“Apiary” means a beeyard or site where honeybee hives, honeybees, or honeybee equipment is located
sections.text: (2)“Apiculture” means the raising, caring for, and breeding of honeybees.(3)“Beekeeping equipment” means honeybee hives, frames, supers, pallets, queen excluders, and other e
